findings.title: PVE-001: Missed approve(spender, 0) Call
findings.description: Alpha Homora fails to `approve(spender,0)` before approving the `router` contract to spend the `fToken`. This can cause compatibility issues with certain ERC20 tokens.

findings.title: PVE-002: Improved Ether Transfer Call
findings.description: In `Gringotts::reducio()` function, using `msg.sender.transfer()` instead of `SafeToken.SafeTransferETH()` for ether transfer calls can cause compatibility issues.

findings.title: PVE-003: Randomly Received Ether Interfere With the Calculation
findings.description: Random users could send ether into the Gringotts contract without permission check, causing inaccurate calculations in engorgio() and reducio() functions.

findings.title: Known Issue in Solidity v0.5.16
findings.description: There is a known compiler issue where a private function can be overridden in a derived contract by a private function of the same name and types.
